definition: Han River
man
Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)
river/CL:條|条[tiao2],道[dao4]
surname Jiang

sentences.english: Since it was from the Han River, it's something fish-like.
sentences.chinese: 这怪物来自汉江，所以有点像鱼。

sentences.english: Large parts of the Han river that bisects the capital are frozen over.
sentences.chinese: 将首尔从中隔断的汉江出现大面积结冰。

sentences.english: Government officials in the south are keenly aware of the changes coming to the Han.
sentences.chinese: 南方的政府官员非常明白汉江会面临的变化。

sentences.english: Dad persuaded the captain of a pien-tzu to take them down the Han River to Hankow.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸说服一条“扁舟”的船老大带他们顺汉江去汉口。

sentences.english: One side diversion brings water from the Yangtze to the Han.
sentences.chinese: 一方面要把长江之水带入汉江。

sentences.english: The running Hanjiang River water has cultivated the Xiantao people's unremitting self-improvement spirit.
sentences.chinese: 奔腾不息的汉江水，孕育了仙桃人自强不息的精神。

sentences.english: The Xikang railway, which will be completed in 2000 estimated, connect the ship way at Ankang.
sentences.chinese: 预计2000年建成的西康铁路在安康与汉江连通。

sentences.english: A stretch of the Hanjiang River at Hanzhong City reached its highest point so far this year.
sentences.chinese: 在汉中市汉江水位，达到今年以来的最高水位点。

sentences.english: The bridge is firing 190 tons of water per minute using river water.
sentences.chinese: 大桥利用汉江可以每分钟喷射190吨江水。

sentences.english: Why is an ambitious dream by Hanjiang River awakened in the lamps of seven stars?
sentences.chinese: 汉江边的大梦，何以竟在七星灯中醒来。

definition: Han River (Hanshui)
Yangtze River, or Chang Jiang
Wei River in Shaanxi through the Guanzhong 關中|关中[Guan1 zhong1] plain
Jialing river in Sichuan (a tributary of the Yangtze)
Huai River, main river of east China, between the Yellow River 黃河|黄河[Huang2 He2] and the Changjiang 長江|长江[Chang2 Jiang1]
Baihe County in Ankang 安康[An1 kang1], Shaanxi/Paiho town in Tainan County 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan

Three Gorges on the Chang Jiang or Yangtze, namely: Qutang Gorge 瞿塘峽|瞿塘峡[Qu2 tang2 Xia2], Wuxia Gorge 巫峽|巫峡[Wu1 Xia2] and Xiling Gorge 西陵峽|西陵峡[Xi1 ling2 Xia2]/Sanxia or Sanhsia town in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
Qingjiang river in Hubei
Lishui river in north Hunan, flowing into Lake Dongting 洞庭湖
Nananqu district of central Chongqing municipality, formerly in Sichuan
Danjiangkou county level city in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei
the Xiangjiang river in Hunan province
Hanyang county in Hubei province/historical name Hanyang for Seoul, Korea
Danjiangkou county level city in Shiyan 十堰[Shi2 yan4], Hubei
Yellow River or Huang He
Hanchuan county level city in Xiaogan 孝感[Xiao4 gan3], Hubei
